html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-03732023-04-28JUS
ActTax Court of Canada Act
SubjectAssociate Judges (Tax Court of Canada) Regulations
PrecisASSOCIATE JUDGES (TAX COURT OF CANADA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish that two associate judges may be appointed to the Tax Court of Canada; and (2) establish that the workload of a supernumerary associate judge is at least 50% of the workload of a non-supernumerary judge.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0084 Publication Date: 2023-05-10
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Associate Judges (Tax Court of Canada) Regulations
precis: ASSOCIATE JUDGES (TAX COURT OF CANADA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish that two associate judges may be appointed to the Tax Court of Canada; and (2) establish that the workload of a supernumerary associate judge is at least 50% of the workload of a non-supernumerary judge.
